name: Dreameaters
description:
Description

In Dreameaters you are a small dream-eating ghost, exploring the night for some tasty dream to feast on. You finally find your prey, a sound asleep kid, probably dreaming about scary clowns, when... you realise that other ghosts like you ended up in the same room as you, and just as hungry as you are.

It's time to fight for survival (and gluttony)! Only the winner will eat!

Controls In menus
  • mouse/keyboard: as usual
In game
  • mouse: look around
  • mouse left click: shoot
  • W/A/S/D: move around
  • ESC: toggle pause menu
  • TAB (hold): show scoreboard
Technologies

Dreameaters has been developes using Unity and C#.

Credits
  • Database: Database Control (Free) by Solution Studios
  • Bedroom environment: Bedroom asset by Vertex Studio
  • Weapon model: Sci-Fi Guns asset by Astronaut
  • Ghost character model: Level 1 Monster Pack asset by PI Entertainment Limited
  • Gun icon: 64 Flat Game Icons asset by Office57
  • Laser shot sound: Laser Wrath 4 sound effect track by marcuslee
  • Gun cocking sound: Gun cock sound effect track by pockroozer
